mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Burrows, Linus P.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Delaware Co., NY [Delaware County, New York]

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Burrows, Linus P. Patient Age: 20. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Chronic diarrhoea [diarrhea]. Home on furlough. Treatment: Astringents, tonics and stimulants. Result: Cured and returned to duty.
